column1: The Pit Room////The Pit Room gets 5 stars for meeting or exceeding all of the things I check when trying a restaurant for the first time. I consider the following items when rating restaurants: facility/location
column4: and food. I ordered the 3 meat dinner so I could try several items. I had the brisket
column6: and white-meat chicken along with mac & cheese and charred green beans (special for the day) as my sides. The mac & cheese wasn't outstanding
column7: but everything else really stood out. The staff was efficient but friendly. The location doesn't have enough onsite parking
column8: but there was plenty of curbside parking on the adjacent street. The line was out the door
column9: but they moved everyone through quickly. I would return to The Pit Room if I'm in the Houston area again.
